It's weird how in two days your whole outlook can change...

I hate the way I feel, I hate myself for letting it hurt like this, I hate him for doing it, I hate myself for hating him...

Monday, it seemed like everything was okay.  It all made sense, everything I had been told...seemed so perfect.  He was there for me... and then Wednesday...shit hits the fan.  I barely fell asleep last night, I was crying my eyes out.  It hurts so bad...and he doesn't understand.  He'll never understand...

Why do I try to be happy?  Why do I let myself fall into the illusion that everything might finally be okay?  Only to be greatly disappointed.
http://basketcasec80.livejournal.com/9171.html

Half of Michelle Michelle and Michelle. Where's Ben? Where's Ben again? Waiting to give her speech. Still waiting. Giving it. Going to get her diploma Walking of stage and the such. Blurry Band More Band. Brendoni looking gorgeous. Thursday - New Found Glory/The Living End/The Lingo... The Living End Bassist from the Living End Again. New Found Glory... The Pit I was almost forced into. Later that night...at John's apartment Sam Katie's bag Mike Chicken Soup on their stove. Sitting on the couch. Sam. Sam hanging on Katie. Aw so cute. Too bad it's kinda cut off. Sam and Katie Brendon's crotch Katie. Shit in their kitchen. Weird picture that Sam took. Shit in their living room. Katie's sexy pants. Shoes. Then I ran out of pictures. I'd tell in detail what happened but I'm getting bitched at to get off the computer. I'll update later...

I feel like I'm falling for him, all over again.

It's crazy what one day with him does for us.  I'm still smiling.  Let's recap.

-Comes over yesterday around 1-2 (i think?)
-Schooling each other in video games
-Listening to music (DC...hell yes)
-Playing some vball
-Acting like an old married couple
-The jokes last night
-Finding out that he was staying over
-Staying up until 12:30 with him
-Waking up crazy early to go to work and seeing him
-HE CAME AND VISITED ME AT WORK

OH WHAT NOW.  It doesn't seem like much but it's exactly what I needed.

I feel...happy right now.  Nothing can bring me down right now.  

Only good things.  Good things mean no bad things happen.  And no bad things means Ben, Michelle, and other people won't yell at me.  NO BAD THINGS!

STRANDED, LOST INSIDE MYSELF. MY OWN WORST FRIEND AND MY OWN CLOSEST ENEMY. I'M BRANDED, MALAJUSTED. NEVER TRUSTED ANYONE LET ALONE MYSELF. I MUST INSIST ON BEING A PESSIMIST, I'M A LONER IN A CATUSTROPHIC MIND. ELECTED, THE REJECTED, I PERFECT THE SCIENCE OF THE IDIOT. NO MEANING, AND NO HEALING. SELF LOATHING FREAK AND INTROVERTED DEVIOT. ~ Armatage Shanks I AM JUST A MUTT, AND NOWHERE IS MY HOME. MY DIGNITY'S A LANDMINE IN THE SCHOOL OF LOST HOPE. I'VE PANHANDLED FOR LIFE, CAUSE I'M NOT AFRAID TO BEG. HAND ME DOWN YOUR LOST AND FOUNDS OF SECOND HAND REGRET. YOU BETTER SWALLOW YOUR PRIDE OR YOU'RE GONNA CHOKE ON IT. YOU BETTER DIGEST YOUR VALUES CAUSE THEY SHIT. HONOR'S GONNA KNOCK YOU DOWN, BEFORE YOUR CHANCE TO STAND UP AND FIGHT. I KNOW I'M NOT THE ONE, I GOT NO PRIDE. WELL SECTS OF DISCONNECTION AND TRADITIONS OF LOST FAITH. NO CULTURE'S WORTH A STREAM OF PISS OR BULLET IN MY FACE. TO HELL WITH UNITY, SEPARATION WILL KILL US ALL. TORN TO SHREDS AND DISJOINTED BEFORE THE FINAL FALL. ~ No Pride READY FOR A CHEAP ESCAPE, ON THE BRINK OF SELF-DESTRUCTION. WIDESPREAD PANIC. BROKEN GLASS INSIDE MY HEAD, BLEEDING DOWN THESE THOUGHTS OF ANGUISH. MASS CONFUSION. WELL THE WORLD IS A SICK MACHINE BREEDING A MASS OF SHIT, WITH SUCH A DESOLATE CONCLUSION. FILL THE VOID WITH...I DON'T CARE. THERE'S A PLAGUE INSIDE OF ME, EATING AT MY DISPOSITION. NOTHING'S LEFT. TORN OUT OF REALITY, INTO A STATE OF NO OPINION. LIMP WITH HATE. STANDING ON THE CORNER OF STUART AND THE AVENUE. RIPPING UP MY TRANSFER AND A PHOTOGRAPH OF YOU. YOU'RE A BLUR OF MY DEAD PAST AND ROTTING EXISTENCE. AS I STAND LAUGHING ON THE CORNER OF INSIGNIFICANCE. DESTINY IS DEAD, IN THE HANDS OF BAD LUCK. BEFORE IT MIGHT HAVE MADE SOME SENSE, BUT NOW IT'S ALL FUCKED UP. SEASONS CHANGE AS WELL AS MINDS AND I'M A TWO FACED CLOWN. YOU'RE MOMMY'S LITTLE NIGHTMARE DRIVING DADDY'S CAR AROUND. I'M BEAT DOWN AND HALF BRAIN DEAD THE LONG LOST KING OF FOOLS. I MAY DUMB BUT I'M NOT STUPID ENOUGH TO STAY WITH YOU. ~ Stuart and the Ave BOXED UP, ALL OF HER FAVORITE THINGS. SOLD THE REST AT A RAINY YARDSALE. BIG PLANS AND LEAVING FRIENDS AND A WESTBOUND SIGN. WEIGHED OUT, HER CHOICES ON A SCALE. PREVAILING NOTHING MADE SENSE. JUST TRANSPORTATION AND A BLANK DECISION...SHE'S TAKING OFF. NO TIME AND NO COPPING OUT. SHE'S BURNING DAYLIGHT AND PETROL. BLACKED OUT THE REARVIEW MIRROR HEADED WESTWARD ON. STRUNG OUT, ON CONFUSION ROAD. AND TEN MINUTE NERVOUS BREAKDOWNS. XANEX A BEER FOR THOUGHT AND SHE'S DETERMINED...SHE'S TAKING OFF. IS IT SALVATION? OR AN ESCAPE FROM DISCONTENT? WILL SHE FIND HER NAME IN THE CALIFORNIA CEMENT? PUNCHED OUT OF THE GRIND THAT PUNCHED HER ONE TOO MANY TIMES. IS TRAGEDY 2,000 MILES AWAY? SHE'S TAKING OFF... ~ Westbound Sign (San Francisco, California, here I come) What to report? Oh right. I'm sick of bitching about it and hating myself for it. I'm gonna do it. Starting right now. It's time to actually do it. I'm going to lose weight and I'm going to be happy with myself by the end of the summer. I don't care what it takes. I want to do it and I'm old enough to be able to do it. Maybe it will keep my mind off of something else (right, Ben?) In other news, she's mad at me and it doesn't even seem like she cares. Great, just great. Another person I've pushed away. It's like no matter what I do, I'm alone. I just...wish that she wasn't mad. *beats head on desk* Ahhhhh I just wish...

Whoa, I just realized how much I'm actually going to miss my sister when she goes to college. *sighs* It's just weird to think about. How am I going to survive in this house with the nazi without her? I...*wants to scream* am going to miss her. It's weird, cause when Alex and I used to fight all the time when I was in like sixth grade, the three years seemed so far away. Now, I'm almost done with freshman year in high school, she's done, today it ended, and it seems like we never even had some sort of a relationship. It's weird. She graduates in about two weeks, that's crazy. She never has to walk through those doors again, she never has to look at all those people in the hallways...it's just weird... As I leave here today, apartment 108 I'll always keep you in my heart. Anderson is cold tonight, The leaves are scattered on the ground. I miss the seasons, And the comfort of your smile. Sometimes this all feels like a dream. I'm waiting for someone to just wake me up, From this life. As I look out at these fairgrounds, I remember how our family split apart. I don't think I ever told you, But I know you always did your best. And the hard times, They only made us stronger. As I sit here all alone, I wonder how I'm suppose to carry on when you're gone. I'll never be the same without you, I love you more then you will ever know. So maybe now you finally know. Sometimes we're helpless and alone, But you can let it keep you weighted down. You must go on. Do you ever feel like crying? Do you ever feel like giving up? I raise my hands up towards the sky, I say this prayer for you tonight, Because nothing is impossible. As I sit here all alone, I wonder how I'm suppose to carry on when you're gone. I'll never be the same without you, I love you more then you will ever know. So maybe now you finally know. Sometimes we're helpless and alone, But you can let it keep you weighted down. You must go on. (The hardest part isn't finding who we need to be, it's being content with who you are.) Stay who you are. You must go on. Stay who you are.
